mapper.insert: insert into users(phone, password, nickname, avatar, gender, student_id, school, create_time, update_time) values( #{phone}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{avatar}, #{gender}, #{studentId}, #{school}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime} )
mapper.select: select user_id, phone, password, nickname, avatar, gender, student_id, school, create_time, update_time from users order by create_time desc
